function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Emerging infectious diseases due to environmental factors","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and indoor air quality in buildings","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient ventilation and air circulation in buildings","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on lighting and sunlight in building design","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited methods to control bacterial pandemics before antibiotics","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dedicated architectural programs for containment","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient traditional containment measures","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Visiting friends or family over the age of 75 on a regular basis","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid spread of the sars-cov-2 virus globally","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of treatment or vaccine for sars-cov-2","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and indoor air quality","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unsanitary interview conditions may promote the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close proximity during interviews may increase the risk of disease transmission","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Startups relying heavily on relational capabilities may lead to increased risk of disease propagation through close contact and interaction with partners and the startup community.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Early stage outbreak containment in a specific area","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Containment of respiratory infections characterized by mild symptoms or pre-symptomatic transmission","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Laboratory testing during the early phase of the epidemic was critical","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased testing capacity coinciding with the travel ban","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through twitter feeds discussing loneliness and covid-19.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate data preprocessing leading to inclusion of irrelevant twitter feeds.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited geographical representation of twitter feeds, specifically from regions with lower participation.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through the built environment due to the clustering of individuals in close proximity.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate control of contagious disease spread due to the presence of statistical noise in the data processing and modeling.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for the impact of social and behavioral factors on contagious disease propagation in the built environment.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection and analysis of publicly available twitter feeds may contain personal or sensitive information related to loneliness and covid-19.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Crisis in the oil sector and global energy security","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for the spread of contagious diseases due to increased economic activity and integration across european countries","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risks associated with the allocation of funds for recovery and economic development, potentially leading to mismanagement and inequitable schemes","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Concessions on energy infrastructure demands","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of price hikes in food or energy as a consequence of 2050 climate goals","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Institutional challenges in implementing the green deal","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The global covid-19 pandemic poses a risk to the health and well-being of individuals worldwide, including the eu and its member Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate investment in green initiatives may lead to environmental conditions that increase disease
